CCTools API Documentation

This is the reference manual for the CCTools API, which includes Chirp, Parrot, Makeflow, Work Queue, and other software.Note that this documentation is a work in progress. Only the most widely used interfaces are documented here. Less used interfaces are not documented, but can still be browsed through this interface.

  • Writing Your First Program with Chirp

If you are writing programs to access Chirp, start here:

  • chirp_reli.h
  • chirp_stream.h

If you are writing programs to submit jobs to Work Queue, Condor, or other systems, start here:

  • work_queue.h
  • batch_job.h

There are a number of other support modules that implement debugging, communication, data structures, and so forth. The most commonly used are:

  • debug.h
  • link.h
  • hash_table.h
  • itable.h
  • md5.h

Or, you can browse all documented modules in the package:

  • See All Modules

For more information about using and installing CCTools:

  • CCTools Software
  • CCTools User Manuals
  • CCTools HOWTO Manuals
